name: Adorable Toy Phone Baby Game
description:
A Must Have App For Parents! Even Better, Babies Love This Toy Phone Game.

The Toy Phone Game features bright colors, wiggling buttons, large and colorful items, piano sounds and lots of entertaining animations with HD cartoon animals!
This fantastic baby phone game features a lot of pre-bundled nursery rhymes and lullabies that gets played when babies make a fake call!

Cool animations on tapping the screen with HD cartoon animals keeps the babies curious for hours and hours of guaranteed fun!

FEATURE LIST:
- Large, colorful buttons with wobbling animation!
- Piano sounds on pressing the buttons
- Bright Colors engage the babies
- iPad, iPad Mini, iPod, iPhone 4S and iPhone 5 support
- Cute Cartoon Animals makes this baby game fun!

Your baby will love bobbing to the music, sound effects and animation packed in this game, that is baby-tested for your peace of mind!

Give it a try! You won't regret it!!

You can always connect to us and stay tuned with updates and provide feedback on:

Facebook: http://facebook.com/mobileroo
Twitter: @mobileroo
Support Email: info@mobileroo.com.au

We would love to see you take action now in giving the best toy phone to your little one today!
